main event: A civilian in Buffalo, New York reported seeing an unidentified object in the sky on July 12, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared to be cylindrical in shape, illuminated from within, and metallic in appearance with a chrome-like finish.
The object hovered motionless at first, then quickly accelerated in a horizontal direction, made a 90-degree turn, and disappeared rapidly from sight.
The entire sighting lasted for about 60 seconds.
The witness was familiar with UFO descriptions and classifications, but this object did not seem to fit any of the usual categories.
The witness called the attention of several other people to the object, but they did not seem to see it or grasp what was being pointed out.
sighted object: a cylindrical, metallic, and illuminated object
photographs: no, the report indicates no photographs were received
